content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
--------------------
### Iron Smelting Furnace at position (5.0, 5.0)
Consists of a furnace located at (5.0, 5.0) that was used to process iron ore and coal into iron plates. This structure supports the production chain required for crafting sub-components needed in lab construction.

### Copper Smelting Furnace at position (-27.0, -60.0)
Consists of a furnace located at (-27.0, -60.0) that was used to process copper ore and coal into copper plates. This structure is integral to meeting copper resource requirements for crafting processes.

ERROR TIPS
----------
• When invoking the get_entities API, ensure that the arguments match the expected signature. Avoid unsupported keyword arguments (such as “radius”) or adding extra positional arguments.
  
• When a function may return None (for instance, when retrieving entities), validate the result and convert it to an empty list to prevent iteration errors.
  
• Prior to initiating lab crafting, verify that all necessary prerequisite ingredients (such as sufficient iron plates for iron-gear-wheels, copper plates for copper-cable production, and the resulting electronic circuits) are available. This helps avoid crafting failures due to missing sub-ingredients.
  
• Before attempting to place a structure (for example, a Lab at a designated position), confirm that the required item is present in the inventory and that placement conditions are met to prevent placement failures.
  
• Maintain consistency in API usage and resource management during recovery attempts so that earlier errors in parameter usage or resource shortages do not compound in subsequent operations.
